body: Is there a way I can give someone my rank (Gold)? If there is I want to.
body_tagged: Is there a way I can give someone my rank (Gold)? If there is I want to.
title: Gold trade

replies.body: You are only allowed to transfer a rank to another account that you own.
replies.body_tagged: You are only allowed to transfer a rank to another account that you own.

replies.body: Nope, you only can give the gold rank away if you have a new minecraft account and you want to transfer it.
replies.body_tagged: Nope, you only can give the gold rank away if you have a new minecraft account and you want to transfer it.

replies.body: duhduhduhhhh, time to "make an account" and give it to "my account" lololol
replies.body_tagged: duhduhduhhhh, time to "make an account" and give it to "my account" lololol

replies.body: The staff can use an IP check to see beforehand if it is the same person or not.
replies.body_tagged: The staff can use an IP check to see beforehand if it is the same person or not.
